meta.fee_euro_approx: Free (Visa Exemption for Indians until further notice)

add.title: Proof of Funds
add.description: 10,000 THB per person or 20,000 THB per family (Cash/Forex Card). Randomly checked.

steps_flow.title: Travel
steps_flow.description: Fly to Thailand with valid passport and return ticket.

steps_flow.title: Immigration
steps_flow.description: Proceed to immigration counter (Indian passport holders get 60-day stamp).
